nodes.text: Oordu was a male Human who served as an ordnance officer in the Mantellian Army of the Galactic Republic-allied Ord Mantell Central Authority during the Separatist War, a conflict between the Central Authority and the Mantellian Separatist Movement. Oordu was posted on the outskirts of the Republic-held Fort Garnik on Avilatan island, where he operated a stall from which he sold weapons. While at his stall Oordu made use of a datapad and wore blue armor and white pants. He had fair skin, red hair and blue eyes.
Oordu first appeared in the 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare. In the game, Oordu is a Republic weapons vendor on Ord Mantell.
